body: Ok, so my map Eerie Masulem or however you spell it was accepted. I need someone to teach me walls YML. I don't know how to make the YML select the sand walls and how to select the cuboid regions. THANKS
body_tagged: Ok, so my map Eerie Masulem or however you spell it was accepted. I need someone to teach me walls YML. I don't know how to make the YML select the sand walls and how to select the cuboid regions. THANKS
title: I need help

replies.body:
Hi Rilo - This is the yml for village.  You can find it here.
 http://maps.avicus.net/Walls/TheVillage/map.yml
Just change basic info and submit, I think.  :)
